content:
[{"id":"nnvMTG5Sl5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🙏Prayer Manual","col":12}},{"id":"B-CtTCmVDX","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The prayers module helps gather, track and manage prayers and prayer requests.","col":12}},{"id":"hkZGijObDP","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The Prayer workspace contains links to prayer reports and documents.","col":12}},{"id":"w8oEjl0tNc","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🙇Prayer Request","col":12}},{"id":"t25CxbBSfh","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Prayer requests are made by (and prayed for) by church people. Prayer requests can also be submitted via users on the site or anonymously via a web form.","col":12}},{"id":"vKO4mgte4s","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When adding a prayer request, note the following:
- Additional prayer request statuses can be created if needed.
- Additional prayer request types can be created if needed.
- If the request is for a specific person, select the person.
- If the request should not be shared with the church, check the 'Is Private' box. These requests will only be visible by Managers & Users of the Church app.","col":12}},{"id":"jBxW6do4OH","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"🤲Prayers","col":12}},{"id":"Wh1jXU5eeV","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Prayers are offered by church people. Prayers may be related to prayer requests.","col":12}},{"id":"AT0xpnyfrl","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"When adding a prayer, note the following:
- Select the person who is saying the prayer.
- A file can be attached if the prayer is a written or recorded prayer.
- Items that were prayed for can be recorded in the 'Prayer Topics' section.
    - Topics can include anything stored in the system (i.e. People, Events, Missionaries, Prayer Requests, etc).
    - Choose the topic type (i.e. Prayer Request), then choose the specific document of that type.","col":12}}]
label: Manual: Prayers
name: Manual: Prayers
title: Manual: Prayers
